verses.verse: Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, O God: for <S%H582>man<s%> would swallow me <S%H7602>up<s%>; he <S%H3898>fighting<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> oppresses <S%H3905>me<s%>.
My <S%H8324>enemies<s%> would <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H7602>swallow<s%> me <S%H7227>up<s%>: for they be many that <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H4791>me<s%>, O you most High.
What <S%H3117>time<s%> I am <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, I will trust in <S%H982>you<s%>.

In <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, in <S%H430>God<s%> I have put my <S%H982>trust<s%>; I will not <S%H3372>fear<s%> what <S%H1320>flesh<s%> can do unto <S%H6213>me<s%>.
Every <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6087>bend<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>: all their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are against me for <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
They gather themselves <S%H1481>together<s%>, they <S%H6845>hide<s%> <S%H8104>themselves<s%>, they mark my <S%H6119>steps<s%>, when they <S%H6960>wait<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Shall they <S%H6405>escape<s%> by <S%H205>iniquity<s%>? in your <S%H639>anger<s%> cast <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>.
You <S%H5608>tell<s%> my <S%H5112>wanderings<s%>: <S%H7760>put<s%> you my <S%H1832>tears<s%> into your <S%H4997>bottle<s%>: are they not in your <S%H5612>book<s%>?
<S%H3117>When<s%> I <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto <S%H341>you<s%>, then shall my enemies <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>: this I <S%H3045>know<s%>; for God is for <S%H430>me<s%>.
In <S%H430>God<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>: in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will I <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>.
In <S%H430>God<s%> have I put my <S%H982>trust<s%>: I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> what <S%H120>man<s%> can do unto <S%H6213>me<s%>.
Your <S%H5088>vows<s%> are upon <S%H430>me<s%>, O God: I will <S%H7999>render<s%> praises unto <S%H8426>you<s%>.

For you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>: will not you deliver my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling<s%>, that I may <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>?
